duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize historical data and market trends to develop accurate demand forecasts.
Analyze inventory levels and sales trends to ensure material availability and on-time delivery.
Participate in the S&OP Process by providing demand inputs for actual vs planned performance.
Assess demand drivers and seasonality to develop new demand strategies.
Continuously improve demand processes and systems to reduce forecast errors.
Collaborate cross-functionally with Sales, Marketing, Operations, Finance, and Logistics teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor in Business or related field
